item.description:
A day after Thanksgiving Feast! – Friday Nov. 26 at 3:00pm.

Day after Thanksgiving Dinner Party at a private home in Cumberland, RI. Children are welcome. The exact address and phone number will be sent to yes rsvps on Nov. 22.
Each Adult is to bring an item to share (see list below). If you are bringing children please bring their beverage of choice also. There is no event fee for children.
$5.00 cash event fee per adult will be collected at the door.

Please RSVP yes only if you are DEFINITELY 100% sure you are attending.


This is what we have----

YES
Germaine – coffee, tea, plates, utensils, cups, glasses, ect….
Deborah – vegetarian chili
Mary Lou Silva - sparkling juice
Phil B – case of coors and white wine
Preeti Varma - a fruit platter
Bob – stuffed mushrooms
Linda – mixed salad & wine
CherylBene - Pasta or Potato Dish
Sandra – stuffed shells
Nance
Maria – cheese & crackers, wine
Maureen- soup
Charlie- yummy dessert
Richard – 5 bottles of wine
Robin – vegetable dish
Flower Child - +1 - Side dish of potato ah, la Roberto.......and BYOB stuff
Laurie - dessert - apple strudel
Linda – lasagna
Roger- Chili with ground turkey and beans, ~3 quarts
Jaye – Chicken wings and wine
Mark – adult beverage
Helane – corn souffle

If you are a yes, please write what you will bring in the RSVP comment box so every one can see- and we don’t have repeats.

Below is a list of what we need. Let me know what you will be bringing – post it in your reply- Thanks!

Appetizer
Veggie platter with dip
Salad and Dressing
Side dish – pasta or potato
Other side dish
Vegetable dish
Soda
Beer
Other adult Beverage
Juice
item.name: A day after Thanksgiving Feast!
